name: Lunatic Heavens
summary:
Produce. Yonder Voice（http://yondervoice.net）
Original. ZUN(上海アリス幻楽団)
Compose & Arrange. 天遊、Chrisphony、Panda_澤、十二月夜、Zris、cnsouka(Vanguard Sound)、KD
Lyric. TurtleIzzy、蒼羅杏、koronko、El Mirador、komine、djhmojt
Vocal. 瑶山百霊、寶井純子
Mixing. NativeWT、瑶山百霊、Chrisphony、Panda_澤、Zris、cnsouka、KD
Mastering. 瑶山百霊
Illustration. KD
Graphic Design. Kuma桃
Special Thanks. iKz、himmel、Rvdavid、宇文子牙、and you
info:
